ExpectedClosingQuoteError.emb_desc: Please, remove any `{quote}` of the parameters.

MissingPermissions.emb_desc: You need the `{perms}` permission{s} to run this command!

BotMissingPermissions.emb_desc: I need the `{perms}` permission{s} to run this command!

memberNotFound.emb_desc:
Member `{member}` wasn't found.
Check lowercase, uppercase or if you typed correctly!

NoPrivateMessage.emb_desc: This command can't be used in DM's

Forbidden.emb_desc: Sorry for sending messages in DM, I don't like it either!
Forbidden.desc_perm:
But seems like you didn't allowed me to speak in {channel_mention}.
Please, give me that perm or try me in another channel.
Forbidden.desc_noperm: But i'm not allowed to speak in the channel, ask to a superior to allow me speaking in {channel_mention}! (or just use another channel)

NotImplementedError.emb_desc: This command is still in developing or it's in maintenance. Wait future updates.

noError.emb_desc: An error ocurred during the execution of this command!
